body_html: It's for when all you have is an abstract Module*, i.e. a "polymorphic copy constructor". In that case you need to know the static type to invoke the copy constructor. @ebetica was showing me some neuroevolution stuff where you guys needed this

body: It's for when all you have is an abstract Module*, i.e. a "polymorphic copy constructor". In that case you need to know the static type to invoke the copy constructor. @ebetica was showing me some neuroevolution stuff where you guys needed this
